announcement.title: Context Checkpoint System Deployed
announcement.description: Automatic context preservation system now active. Prevents data loss during context compaction.

how_it_works.trigger: Automatically triggers when Claude Code token budget drops below 5%
how_it_works.action: Saves complete system state to JSON checkpoint
how_it_works.recovery: After context reset, state automatically reloaded - no memory gap

for_frontend_execution.message: The 250-round Frontend Live Log execution will now persist seamlessly across context compactions
for_frontend_execution.benefit: No more restarting work due to context resets
for_frontend_execution.continuity: Resume exactly where you left off

key_features: Automatic trigger at <5% token budget - no manual action needed
Fast recovery after context reset - state loaded immediately
No data loss - all state preserved between compactions
Task continuity - tasks resume from exact point

next_steps.if_reset: Load checkpoint and continue - no action needed

final_note: This solves the context gap problem. You can now work confidently without losing state between compactions.
